abstract: The police have raided Amazon’s Tokyo headquarters, a distribution center and the offices of an affiliate, according to Japanese news reports.
snippet: The police have raided Amazon’s Tokyo headquarters, a distribution center and the offices of an affiliate, according to Japanese news reports.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — Amazon.com’s Japan unit has said that it is cooperating with the local authorities in an investigation into whether child pornography has been sold on its website.

headline.main: Amazon Investigated in Japan Over Child Pornography

byline.original: By Paul Mozur and Mark Scott
